Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I was looking through some spacecraft photos, when I found this:

http://www.space.com/12033-spacex-dragon-space-capsule-infographic.html

The capsule looks similar to ours.

It has RCS blocks.

Can we build it?

I want to see someone build an identical rocket to this that can get into orbit with these two stages.

Obviously, part packs are REQUIRED.

So, it should look like this:

Chute-pod (with RCS surrounding it)-fuel tank (two solar panels on it)-engine-decoupler-SRB

GO!

I\'ll attach mine when I build it.
There\'s already a dragon capsule in this pack, and there is a rocket exactly like you describe (and completely unlike the real falcon 9, hilariously enough) in this pack.

There\'s already a dragon capsule in this pack, and there is a rocket exactly like you describe (and completely unlike the real falcon 9, hilariously enough) in this pack.

feck. :-[

Oh well.
I can get a single capsule into orbit with two stages, easy.

I can get a single capsule into orbit with two stages, easy.

Not the point, Nova.
